about_the_game:
Description:

Add a touch of luxury and mystique to your gaming sessions with the Gemstone Dice Pack, exclusively designed for Game Master Engine. This DLC offers an assortment of finely crafted 3D dice inspired by precious gemstones: Amethyst, Onyx, Alabaster, Emerald, Ruby, and Sapphire. Each set imbues your rolls with a unique visual flair, making each action in your campaign sparkle with importance.

Compatibility:

Requires the base game Game Master Engine.
An Internet connection is required for download and authentication.

short_description: Enhance your 3D virtual tabletop experience in Game Master Engine with the Gemstone Dice Pack. This cosmetic DLC offers six sets of intricately designed, gemstone-themed dice for more elegant and visually striking rolls.
